titleStmt.title: Stela from Prasat Chrung, south-west (K. 288), 12th century Śaka

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: The akṣaras are of square form which is characteristic of the script belonging to the reign of Jayavarman VII.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

lg.l: vrahmarṣer iva devarājam aditir devī sudharmmāśritaṁ
sa māram īśe jitavāṁs tu yadbhūḥ
vego bhuje yasya tu tat prakopaḥ
śāntiṁ punar yas tu vinaiva yatnaṁ
Anukuruta Ime te nirmmite śrīmatā śrī
śāstur yathā me yam atīva yatnaḥ
rakṣāṁ rājyam aharyudhaiva jagr̥he / bhartur yaśovarmmaṇaḥ
bhūmā daityatamojayāt tribhuvanādityaś ca tasmād api
kr̥tvāḍhyām avanīm anūnavibhavair durgāṁś ca vaprādikāṁ
. jātotsāhā yadi purahr̥tau durhr̥do durgrahāt sa
. - - nyāḥ kr̥tibhir niśīthasamaye bhedyā bhaṭair yatna -
na te 'pi yais sā dviradair i - -

div.p:
. śloka Aṁvi puṣpāy[udhā] ...
daṁnuk· kamrate[ṅ·] ...
. śloka ...
daṁnu[k·] ...
. ślo[ka] ...
daṁnuk· ...
. śloka Aṁvi ...
daṁnuk· kamrateṅ· ...
First edited partly by George Cœdès (4209-231); reedited here by Dominic Goodall and Kunthea Chhom from the estampage EFEO n. 345.
